content.content: For the next Issue Discussion Call, we are providing a list of suggested topics below and wanted know which one interests you the most. We also want to hear from you for other suggestions, so please reply to the forum post with your suggestion or DM me in Discord (thomas.flitter#8853). The poll will remain open until next Monday, March 14th. We hope you’ll take part in the poll and will join us on the Issue Discussion Call on March 23rd. Additional call details coming soon. Thank you. Thomas     What steps would improve the Core Unit budget modification process? How do we meet our growing external communication needs (social media, website, branding)? Is Real World Asset Fast Tracking a viable solution? What ways could we improve the onboarding process? Open Suggestion Abstain     0 voters

I am a little biased with my answer: How do we meet our growing external communication needs (social media, website, branding). That is only because improvements in social media, website and introduction of a new Marcomms CU would significantly help to push my work forward, almost like a nitro boost.
This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
